title: What Is LVT Flooring? Floating vs Glue Down, Specs & Terms
blurb: Reference explanation of LVT (Luxury Vinyl Tile) flooring. Learn what LVT is, the difference between floating (rigid core) and glue-down formats, and common specifications found on technical data sheets.

title: What Is Hardwood Flooring? Types, Finishes & Installation Methods Explained
blurb: Reference explanation of hardwood flooring. Learn the difference between solid and engineered hardwood, prefinished vs site-finished products, and common hardwood installation methods.

title: What Is Laminate Flooring? Construction, Specs & Terms Explained
blurb: Reference explanation of laminate flooring. Learn what laminate is, how it is constructed, and common laminate specifications like thickness, AC rating, and core density.

title: Engineered Hardwood Explained | Flooring Reference
blurb: Plain-English explanation of engineered hardwood: what it is, how it differs from solid hardwood, and the specs you’ll see on technical data sheets. Reference-only, no product recommendations.

title: What Is Carpet Flooring? Formats, Specs & Terms Explained
blurb: Reference explanation of carpet flooring. Learn what carpet is, the difference between stretch-in, glue-down, and carpet tile formats, and common carpet specifications like face weight, density, and pile height.

title: Carpet Tile Explained | Flooring Reference
blurb: Plain-English explanation of carpet tile: what it is, how it differs from broadloom (stretch-in/glue-down), and the specs you’ll see on technical data sheets. Reference-only, no product recommendations.

title: What Is Carpet Flooring? Formats, Specs & Terms Explained
blurb: Reference explanation of carpet flooring. Learn what carpet is, the difference between stretch-in, glue-down, and carpet tile formats, and common carpet specifications like face weight, density, and pile height.
